text: May 23, 2018 / 5:08 PM / Updated 20 minutes ago IPL Scoreboard Reuters Staff 3 Min Read May 23 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play on the first day of eliminator between Kolkata Knight Riders and Rajasthan Royals on Wednesday at Kolkata, India Kolkata Knight Riders win by 25 runs Kolkata Knight Riders 1st innings Sunil Narine st Heinrich Klaasen b Krishnappa Gowtham 4 Chris Lynn c&b Shreyas Gopal 18 Robin Uthappa c&b Krishnappa Gowtham 3 Nitish Rana c Jaydev Unadkat b Jofra Archer 3 Dinesh Karthik c Ajinkya Rahane b Ben Laughlin 52 Shubman Gill c Heinrich Klaasen b Jofra Archer 28 Andre Russell Not Out 49 Javon Searles c Jofra Archer b Ben Laughlin 2 Extras 4b 0lb 1nb 0pen 5w 10 Total (20.0 overs) 169-7 Fall of Wickets : 1-4 Narine, 2-17 Uthappa, 3-24 Rana, 4-51 Lynn, 5-106 Gill, 6-135 Karthik, 7-164 Scantlebury-Searles Did Not Bat : Chawla, Yadav, Krishna Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Krishnappa Gowtham 3 0 15 2 5.00 Jofra Archer 4 0 33 2 8.25 3w 1nb Jaydev Unadkat 2 0 33 0 16.50 Ish Sodhi 4 0 15 0 3.75 Shreyas Gopal 4 0 34 1 8.50 Ben Laughlin 3 0 35 2 11.67 2w Rajasthan Royals 1st innings Ajinkya Rahane c&b Kuldeep Yadav 46 Rahul Tripathi c&b Piyush Chawla 20 Sanju Samson c Javon Searles b Piyush Chawla 50 Heinrich Klaasen Not Out 18 Stuart Binny c Chris Lynn b Prasidh Krishna 0 Krishnappa Gowtham Not Out 9 Extras 0b 0lb 0nb 0pen 1w 1 Total (20.0 overs) 144-4 Fall of Wickets : 1-47 Tripathi, 2-109 Rahane, 3-126 Samson, 4-130 Binny Did Not Bat : Archer, Gopal, Sodhi, Unadkat, Laughlin Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Andre Russell 3 0 22 0 7.33 Prasidh Krishna 4 0 28 1 7.00 Piyush Chawla 4 0 24 2 6.00 Sunil Narine 4 0 39 0 9.75 1w Kuldeep Yadav 4 0 18 1 4.50 Javon Searles 1 0 13 0 13.00 Umpire Nitin Menon Umpire Anil Chaudhary Video Handunnettige Dharmasena Match Referee Javagal Srinath
